name: Skloper
description:
Controls:

Use the mouse to tilt the level, and press space to jump.

You can pause by pressing esc.

Description:

Skloper is a short 3D platformer inspired by Kororinpa on the Wii https://www.kororinpa.com/ . You tilt the level to roll the player around, aiming to reach the bottom of a given ski slope as quickly as possible.
